headline.seo: DNA Evidence in Police Interrogation Rooms Requires Bleach

docs.snippet: Although gathering evidence from soda cans and cigarette butts left by suspects in police interrogation rooms is common on television, doing so in actual investigations is a complex affair....
docs.abstract: New York City Police Dept must ensure that certain protocols are followed when collecting DNA evidence left by suspects in interrogation rooms; some detectives say that all the rules, which include scrubbing the interview room with bleach and water solution, have discouraged many from using the tactic at all.
docs.lead_paragraph: Although gathering evidence from soda cans and cigarette butts left by suspects in police interrogation rooms is common on television, doing so in actual investigations is a complex affair.

headline.print_headline: National Retailers Discover a Brooklyn Mall
headline.seo: National Retailers Discover Fulton Street Mall in Brooklyn
headline.main: National Retailers Discover a Brooklyn Mall

docs.snippet: The Fulton Street Mall has been changing in recent years, as national retail chains take the places of local sneaker stores and jewelry repair shops....
docs.abstract: National retail chains are changing the landscape of the Fulton Street Mall in Downtown Brooklyn, as many are flocking to the shopping strip that once housed local sneaker stores and jewelery repair shops.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Fulton Street Mall has been changing in recent years, as national retail chains take the places of local sneaker stores and jewelry repair shops.

headline.print_headline: McIlroy Opts Out of Grand Slam
headline.seo: Rory McIlroy Opts Out of Grand Slam
headline.main: McIlroy Opts Out of Grand Slam

docs.snippet: Rory McIlroy, the P.G.A. Championship winner, will instead play in the European Tour’s BMW Masters in China....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, the P.G.A. Championship winner, will instead play in the European Tour’s BMW Masters in China.

headline.seo: South Africa Leads One-Day Cricket Ranking
headline.main: South Africa Leads One-Day Cricket Ranking

docs.snippet: South Africa topped England by 80 runs and takes top spot....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa topped England by 80 runs and takes top spot.

headline.print_headline: Wallace Reports to Steelers; Redskins Release Cooley
headline.main: Wallace Reports to Steelers; Redskins Release Cooley

docs.snippet: Mike Wallace was at the team facility Tuesday. Also, the Washington Redskins released tight end Chris Cooley....
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; restricted free-agent wide receiver Mike Wallace reports to Pittsburgh Steelers training facility, though he has yet to sign his one-year, $2.7-million contract; Washington Redskins release Pro Bowl tight end Chris Cooley; other news noted.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Wallace was at the team facility Tuesday. Also, the Washington Redskins released tight end Chris Cooley.

headline.print_headline: WellPoint C.E.O. Resigns as Sales Fall
headline.seo: WellPoint C.E.O. Resigns After Drop in Sales
headline.main: WellPoint C.E.O. Resigns as Sales Fall

docs.snippet: Angela Braly will be replaced by John Cannon, the company’s executive vice president, while the company searches for a replacement....
docs.abstract: WellPoint chief executive Angela F Braly steps down after disappointing sales and a reduced forecast caused by rising costs and lower membership; company will look at internal and external candidates for a successor.
docs.lead_paragraph: Angela Braly will be replaced by John Cannon, the company’s executive vice president, while the company searches for a replacement.

docs.snippet: A reader contrasts his trip with another reader’s unhappy experience....
docs.lead_paragraph: A reader contrasts his trip with another reader’s unhappy experience.

headline.print_headline: Bargain Seekers Broaden Manhattan’s Silicon Alley
headline.seo: Tech Firms in Manhattan Trade Trendy Lofts for Midtown Bargains
headline.main: Bargain Seekers Broaden Manhattan’s Silicon Alley

docs.snippet: Increases in commercial rents in Manhattan have led a range of technology companies to leave hipper neighborhoods for cheaper rents in Midtown....
docs.abstract: Increases in commercial rents and residential conversions of buildings in Manhattan are leading a range of technology companies to leave hipper downtown neighborhoods for cheaper rents in Midtown; fledgling start-ups have become more cost-conscious than their predecessors, seeking significant savings in less trendy areas.
docs.lead_paragraph: Increases in commercial rents in Manhattan have led a range of technology companies to leave hipper neighborhoods for cheaper rents in Midtown.
